title: South Hill Rental
posting_body: All new and Gorgeous 3156sqft 5bd/2.5bath home in desirable Silver Creek community!
Situated on a large corner lot, new exterior and interior paint to include exterior lighting and 3 car garage!
Beautiful living room w/stone FP as the centerpiece of the room.
Open concept inspired family room, chef's delight kitchen, pantry, tile counters w/ island, new sink and garbage disposal, new hardwood laminate floors, all new carpet throughout home.
Simply lovely master suite w/FP, 5pc master bath.
Beautifully landscaped!
Get approved quickly so you can live in this beautiful home.
In order to qualify for the Rent To Own Program:
• You must have at least $85,000 in Combined Gross Household Income
A minimum FICO score of 620
• No evictions in the past 3 years
• Takes 5-6 weeks from start to finish
We work with previous bankruptcies, foreclosures and short sales!
There is a 1 time $75 application fee, which is good for the whole household, and for any of our qualifying houses!
You must be pre-approved to view any available properties.
Pet Friendly!
Up to 3 cats/dogs OKAY!
(Due to extreme insurance liability, we cannot allow Dobermans, Pitbulls, Rottweilers or Mastiffs)
Contact me today for more information and details about the program!
The home in the picture is an example of what you could get, it's not this home in particular.
•	do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers
Kristin Hood
Keller Williams Lake Tapps
